发版说明

新特性

  • [inlong-122] Increase JAVA version collection of SDK environment
  • [inlong-163] Flume sink for inlong
  • [inlong-197] Support inlong connector for Apache Flink
  • [inlong-238] Support inlong connector for Apache Spark Streaming
  • [inlong-239] support deployment on kubernetes

  • [inlong-46] Correct some spelling issues
